Michael Godson Ifeanyichukwu, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Mike Godson (amụrụ na October 10, 1985) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọchụnta ego
A mụrụ ya na Kano Steeti, Naịjirịa mana ọ bụ onye Imo Steeti.
Godson gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Jos, Plateau Steeti ma nwee nzere bachelọ na  ihe nkiri.
Mike Godson malitere ime ihe nkiri na 2009 ma kemgbe ahụ ka a maara ya maka ịkọwa ọrụ ịhụnanya na Nollywood
Godson apụtala na ihe karịrị 100 ihe nkiri
O gosipụtara na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dị ka Pete Edochie, Clem Ohameze, Kenneth Okonkwo, Van Vicker na John Dumelo

Ọ bịara n'ihu ọha na 2015 mgbe o mere ihe nkiri akpọrọ 7 Books of Moses N'afọ 2018, Godson bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na ndị otu mmepụta Bollywood jikọtara ya na Zee World. Godson na-ejikwa ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nhazi ọrụ ugbo na azụmaahịa. Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na-enye ya mkpa ya, Godson atụwo aro na ọ nwere ike ọ gaghị enwe ike inye ya nchekwa ego. A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa site na Independent National Electoral Commission n'afọ 2015.
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, a katọrọ Godson maka ịkwa ndị Naijiria dara ogbenye emo n'oge mkpọchi ọrịa COVID-19.
